H0.text: Who wrote the epic 1869 novel War and Peace. Gustave Flaubert

H1.text: Who wrote the epic 1869 novel War and Peace. Fyodor Dostoevsky

H2.text: Who wrote the epic 1869 novel War and Peace. Victor Hugo

H3.text: Who wrote the epic 1869 novel War and Peace. Tolstoy

A4.text: Tolstoy's War and Peace (which is to Tolstoy really an epic in prose) therefore did not qualify.
